description: Try our easy to follow Balsamic Braised Leek & Capsicums recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Balsamic Braised Leek & Capsicums Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 leeks, trimmed, cleaned and cut into 1 cm pieces
1 orange capsicum, cored, deseeded and cut into 1 cm chunks
1 red capsicum, cored, deseeded and cut into 1 cm chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a saucepan, add the leeks and capsicums and stir well. Cover and cook very gently for 10 minutes.
Add the vinegar to the pan and cook, uncovered, for a further 10 minutes. The vegetables should be brown from the vinegar and all the liquid should have evaporated.
Season well with salt and pepper, then stir in the chopped parsley just before serving.
